channel.title: How i make a gold crown
channel.description: hello im a owner of a server and my player rights are 4 i c a gold crown but other players dont c it in front of my name how i eddit that they also c it

item.title: How i make a gold crown
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Maybe he has another question. Don’t tell the moderators to lock unless it’s something that NEEDS to be locked because it is breaking the rules. When he is done, he has the choice to say Lock please or not.

Nothing here is breaking the rules. As far as I can see, he is still asking his question.

EDIT:
I’m not sure how to get the crown to reappear though. If someone could help you with that, that is all you would need to switch it. I can try to figure it out though.

item.title: How i make a gold crown
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

I’m pretty sure joshlol is right. 4 is hidden administrator, and 3 is server owner. I know that 3 is for a FACT a server owner. I THINK that 4 is hidden administrator.

Read full topic

item.title: How i make a gold crown
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

3 and 4 are technically the same, unless you make commands where only pRights 4 can use… so just change your rights to 3.
